Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_sad_core_rate : rate of coring.

Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_sad_mode: mode for sad of peaking calculation, 0: block based; 1: other sharp.

Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_hsad_hlpf: hlpf for hsad for peaking calculation,0:no hlpf; 1: with [1 2 2 2 1] hlpf.

Control.name: reg_sr3_pk_vsad_hlpf

Control.name: reg_sr3_pk_dsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_dsad_hlpf: hlpf for dsad for peaking calculation,0:no hlpf; 1: with [1 2 2 2 1] hlpf.

Control.name: reg_sr3_pk_hpdrt_mode
Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_hpdrt_mode: mode for HPdrt filter

Control.name: reg_sr3_pk_bpdrt_mode
Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_bpdrt_mode: mode for BPdrt filter

Control.name: reg_pk_drtbld_range
Control.desc: reg_pk_drtbld_range: range of the min2 and min direction distance

Control.name: reg_sr3_pk_ti_blend_mode
Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_ti_blend_mode: blend mode of the TI and PK result

Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_Hp_hvcon_replace8_maxsad: replace HP hvcon by maxsad

Control.name: sr3_pk_bp_hvcon_replace8_maxsad
Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_bp_hvcon_replace8_maxsad: replace BP hvcon by maxsad

Control.name: sr3_pk_hp_hvcon_replace8lv_gain
Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_hp_hvcon_replace8lv_gain: gain to local variant before calculating the hv gain for peaking.

Control.name: sr3_pk_bp_hvcon_replace8lv_gain
Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_bp_hvcon_replace8lv_gain: gain to local variant before calculating the hv gain for peaking.

Control.name: reg_sr3_sad_intlev_mode
Control.desc: reg_sr3_sad_intlev_mode: interleave detect xerr mode: 0 max; 1: sum

Control.name: reg_sr3_sad_intlev_mode1
Control.desc: reg_sr3_sad_intlev_mode1: mode 1 of using diagonal protection: 1: with diagonal protection

Control.name: reg_sr3_sad_intlev_gain
Control.desc: reg_sr3_sad_intlev_gain: interleave detection for sad gain applied, normalized to 8 as 1

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_maxerr_mode
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_maxerr_mode : : 0 max err; 1: xerr. unsigned , default = 1

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_core_rate
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_core_rate : : normalized 64 as 1. unsigned, default = 13

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_core_ofst
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_core_ofst : : normalized 64 as 1. signed, default = 1

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par0
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par0 : : threshold0 of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel, this will be set value of flat region mierr that no need peaking.. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par1
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par1 : : threshold1 of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel,this will be set value of texture region mierr that can not do peaking. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 24

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par2
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par2 : : level limit(for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel, this will be set to alp2 that we can do for flat region. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par3
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par3 : : level limit(for th0 less than mierr less than th1) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel, this will be set to alp2 that we can do for misc region. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 16

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par4
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par4 : : level limit(for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel, this will be set to alp2 that we can do for texture region. 0~255. default = 63;. unsigned , default = 255

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par5
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par5 : : rate0 (for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par6
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par6 : : rate1 (for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_min
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_min : : normalized to 64 as 1. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_max
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_max : : normalized to 64 as 1. unsigned , default = 63

Control.name: reg_final_gain_rs
Control.desc: reg_final_gain_rs : : right shift bits for the gain normalization, 0 normal to 32 as 1; 1 normal to 64 as 1; -2 normal to 8 as 1; -1 normal to 16 as 1 . signed , default = 0

Control.name: reg_hp_final_gain-variable
Control.desc: reg_hp_final_gain : : gain to highpass boost result (including directional/circle blending), normalized 32 as 1, 0~255. 1.25 * 32. unsigned , default = 40

Control.name: reg_bp_final_gain-variable
Control.desc: reg_bp_final_gain : : gain to bandpass boost result (including directional/circle blending), normalized 32 as 1, 0~255. 1.25 * 32. unsigned , default = 30

Control.name: reg_pk_sad_ver_gain
Control.desc: reg_pk_sad_ver_gain : : gain to sad[4], 16 normalized to 1;. unsigned , default = 24

Control.name: reg_pk_sad_hor_gain
Control.desc: reg_pk_sad_hor_gain : : gain to sad[0], 16 normalized to 1;. unsigned , default = 24

Control.name: reg_pk_bias_diag
Control.desc: reg_pk_bias_diag : : bias towards diag. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_drt_force
Control.desc: reg_pk_drt_force : : force direction of drt peaking filter, h2b: 0:hp drt force, 1: bp drt force; 2: bp+hp drt force, 3: no force;. unsigned , default = 24

Control.name: reg_pk_os_hsidecore
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_hsidecore : : side coring (not to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in horizontal direction. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 8

Control.name: reg_pk_os_hsidegain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_hsidegain : : side gain (not to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in horizontal direction. normalized to 32 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_os_hmidcore
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_hmidcore : : midd coring (to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in horizontal direction. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 2

Control.name: reg_pk_os_hmidgain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_hmidgain : : midd gain (to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in horizontal direction. normalized to 32 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_os_vsidecore
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_vsidecore : : side coring (not to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in vertical direction. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 8

Control.name: reg_pk_os_vsidegain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_vsidegain : : side gain (not to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in vertical direction. normalized to 32 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_os_vmidcore
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_vmidcore : : midd coring (to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in vertical direction. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 2

Control.name: reg_pk_os_vmidgain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_vmidgain : : midd gain (to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in vertical direction. normalized to 32 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_os_minerr_core
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_minerr_core : : coring to minerr for adaptive overshoot margin. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 40

Control.name: reg_pk_os_minerr_gain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_minerr_gain : : gain to minerr based adaptive overshoot margin. normalized to 64 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 6

Control.name: reg_pk_os_adpt_max
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_adpt_max : : maximum limit adaptive overshoot margin (4x). 0~255. unsigned , default = 200

Control.name: reg_pk_os_adpt_min-variable
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_adpt_min : : minimun limit adaptive overshoot margin (1x). 0~255. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_osh_mode
Control.desc: reg_pk_osh_mode : : 0~3: (2x+1) window in H direction. unsigned , default = 2

Control.name: reg_pk_osv_mode
Control.desc: reg_pk_osv_mode : : 0~3: (2x+1) window in V direction. unsigned , default = 2

Control.name: reg_pk_os_down
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_down : : static negative overshoot margin. 0~1023. unsigned , default = 200

Control.name: reg_pk_os_up
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_up : : static positive overshoot margin. 0~1023. unsigned , default = 200

Control.name: reg_satprt_sat_core
Control.desc: reg_satprt_sat_core: 4x will be coring to cor(irgb_max-irgb_min) to calculate the oy_delt, the smaller the more protection to color, the larger only the rich color will be protected.

Control.name: reg_satprt_sat_rate
Control.desc: reg_satprt_sat_rate: rate to cor(irgb_max-irgb_min) to calculate the oy_delt,the larger the more protection to color; norm 16 as 1

Control.name: reg_satprt_csc_mode
Control.desc: reg_satprt_csc_mode: CSC mode of current yuv input: 0:601; 1:709; 2:BT2020 NCL; 3:reserved

Control.name: reg_satprt_is_lmt
Control.desc: reg_satprt_is_lmt: flag telling the YUV is limited range data or full rang data; 1 is limited data

Control.name: reg_satprt_enable

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_siderand
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_siderand : // unsigned , default = 1 options to use side two lines use the rand, instead of use for the YUV three component of middle line, 0: seed[3]/bandrand[3] for middle line yuv; 1: seed[3]/bandrand[3] for nearby three lines Y;

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_randmode
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_randmode : // unsigned , default = 0 mode of rand noise adding, 0: same noise strength for all difs; else: strenght of noise will not exceed the difs, MIN((pPKReg -> reg_nrdeband_bandrand[m]), noise[m])

Control.desc: 0x5137,19:18,RW,2,reg_sr7_cc_ydlt_sel:color compensation output luma selection, 0: peaking+lti output; 1: dnlp output; 2/3: peaking+lti+dnlp

Control.desc: 0x5137,17:16,RW,1,reg_sr7_cc_sat_norm:normalization of lut slider to saturation. 0: norm to 8 as 1.0, sat[0:23/8]; 1: norm to 16 as 1.0, sat[1/16:31/16]; 2: norm to 32 as 1.0, sat[17/32:47/32]; 3:norm to 64 as 1.0, sat[49/64:79/64]

Control.desc: 0x5137,15:8,RW,64,reg_sr7_cc_ydlt_pscl:prescale to the y-delta (if greater than0) before feeding to y-lumadlt, normalized 64 as 1.0

Control.desc: 0x5137,7:0,RW,64,reg_sr7_cc_ydlt_nscl:prescale to the y-delta (if less than0) before feeding to y-lumadlt, normalized 64 as 1.0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_h2_mode
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_h2_mode: selection filter H2, 0: [0 0 0 -2 0 0 2 0 0], 1: [-2 0 0 0 2], 2or3: [0-2 0 0 0 0 0 2 0] .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_v2_mode
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_v2_mode : selection filter V2, 0: [0 -2 0 0 2], 1: [-2 0 0 0 2] .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_d2_mode
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_d2_mode : selectino filter D2, 0: [0 -2 0 0 2], 1: [-2 0 0 0 2] .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_hwin_mm
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_hwin_mm : horizontal window size, 0:1x7, 1:1x9, 2or3: 1x11 .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_vwin_mm
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_vwin_mm : vertical window size, 0:1 cloumn,1:3cloumn, 2or3:5cloumn.unsigned,default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_xwin_st
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_xwin_st: window location: hstart .unsigned , default = 0

Control.desc: reg_fmeter_xwin_ed: window location: hend .unsigned , default = 1920

Control.name: reg_fmeter_ywin_st

Control.name: reg_fmeter_ywin_ed
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_ywin_ed: window location: vend .unsigned , default = 1080

Control.name: reg_fmeter_coring_h
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_coring_h: coring of diff before compare with threshold for horizontal frequency .unsigned , default = 4

Control.name: reg_fmeter_coring_v
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_coring_v: coring of diff before compare with threshold for vertical frequency .unsigned , default = 4

Control.name: reg_fmeter_coring_d

Control.name: reg_fmeter_low_bound

Control.name: reg_sr3_pk_dsad_hlpf
Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_dsad_hlpf: hlpf for dsad for peaking calculation,0:no hlpf; 1: with [1 2 2 2 1] hlpf.

Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_hpdrt_mode: mode for HPdrt filter

Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_bpdrt_mode: mode for BPdrt filter

Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_bp_hvcon_replace8_maxsad: replace BP hvcon by maxsad

Control.name: sr3_pk_bp_hvcon_replace8lv_gain
Control.desc: reg_sr3_pk_bp_hvcon_replace8lv_gain: gain to local variant before calculating the hv gain for peaking.

Control.name: reg_sr3_sad_intlev_mode
Control.desc: reg_sr3_sad_intlev_mode: interleave detect xerr mode: 0 max; 1: sum

Control.name: reg_sr3_sad_intlev_mode1
Control.desc: reg_sr3_sad_intlev_mode1: mode 1 of using diagonal protection: 1: with diagonal protection

Control.name: reg_sr3_sad_intlev_gain
Control.desc: reg_sr3_sad_intlev_gain: interleave detection for sad gain applied, normalized to 8 as 1

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_maxerr_mode
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_maxerr_mode : : 0 max err; 1: xerr. unsigned , default = 1

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_core_rate
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_core_rate : : normalized 64 as 1. unsigned, default = 13

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_core_ofst
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_core_ofst : : normalized 64 as 1. signed, default = 1

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par0
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par0 : : threshold0 of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel, this will be set value of flat region mierr that no need peaking.. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par1
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par1 : : threshold1 of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel,this will be set value of texture region mierr that can not do peaking. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 24

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par2
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par2 : : level limit(for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel, this will be set to alp2 that we can do for flat region. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par3
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par3 : : level limit(for th0 less than mierr less than th1) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel, this will be set to alp2 that we can do for misc region. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 16

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par4
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par4 : : level limit(for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel, this will be set to alp2 that we can do for texture region. 0~255. default = 63;. unsigned , default = 255

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par5
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par5 : : rate0 (for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par6
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par6 : : rate1 (for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_min
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_min : : normalized to 64 as 1. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_max
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_max : : normalized to 64 as 1. unsigned , default = 63

Control.name: reg_final_gain_rs
Control.desc: reg_final_gain_rs : : right shift bits for the gain normalization, 0 normal to 32 as 1; 1 normal to 64 as 1; -2 normal to 8 as 1; -1 normal to 16 as 1 . signed , default = 0

Control.name: reg_hp_final_gain-variable
Control.desc: reg_hp_final_gain : : gain to highpass boost result (including directional/circle blending), normalized 32 as 1, 0~255. 1.25 * 32. unsigned , default = 40

Control.name: reg_bp_final_gain-variable
Control.desc: reg_bp_final_gain : : gain to bandpass boost result (including directional/circle blending), normalized 32 as 1, 0~255. 1.25 * 32. unsigned , default = 30

Control.name: reg_pk_sad_ver_gain
Control.desc: reg_pk_sad_ver_gain : : gain to sad[4], 16 normalized to 1;. unsigned , default = 24

Control.name: reg_pk_sad_hor_gain
Control.desc: reg_pk_sad_hor_gain : : gain to sad[0], 16 normalized to 1;. unsigned , default = 24

Control.name: reg_pk_bias_diag
Control.desc: reg_pk_bias_diag : : bias towards diag. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_drt_force
Control.desc: reg_pk_drt_force : : force direction of drt peaking filter, h2b: 0:hp drt force, 1: bp drt force; 2: bp+hp drt force, 3: no force;. unsigned , default = 24

Control.name: reg_pk_os_hsidecore
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_hsidecore : : side coring (not to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in horizontal direction. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 8

Control.name: reg_pk_os_hsidegain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_hsidegain : : side gain (not to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in horizontal direction. normalized to 32 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_os_hmidcore
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_hmidcore : : midd coring (to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in horizontal direction. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 2

Control.name: reg_pk_os_hmidgain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_hmidgain : : midd gain (to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in horizontal direction. normalized to 32 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_os_vsidecore
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_vsidecore : : side coring (not to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in vertical direction. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 8

Control.name: reg_pk_os_vsidegain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_vsidegain : : side gain (not to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in vertical direction. normalized to 32 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_os_vmidcore
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_vmidcore : : midd coring (to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in vertical direction. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 2

Control.name: reg_pk_os_vmidgain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_vmidgain : : midd gain (to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in vertical direction. normalized to 32 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_os_minerr_core
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_minerr_core : : coring to minerr for adaptive overshoot margin. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 40

Control.name: reg_pk_os_minerr_gain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_minerr_gain : : gain to minerr based adaptive overshoot margin. normalized to 64 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 6

Control.name: reg_pk_os_adpt_max
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_adpt_max : : maximum limit adaptive overshoot margin (4x). 0~255. unsigned , default = 200

Control.name: reg_pk_os_adpt_min-variable
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_adpt_min : : minimun limit adaptive overshoot margin (1x). 0~255. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_osh_mode
Control.desc: reg_pk_osh_mode : : 0~3: (2x+1) window in H direction. unsigned , default = 2

Control.name: reg_pk_osv_mode
Control.desc: reg_pk_osv_mode : : 0~3: (2x+1) window in V direction. unsigned , default = 2

Control.name: reg_pk_os_down
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_down : : static negative overshoot margin. 0~1023. unsigned , default = 200

Control.name: reg_pk_os_up
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_up : : static positive overshoot margin. 0~1023. unsigned , default = 200

Control.name: reg_satprt_sat_core
Control.desc: reg_satprt_sat_core: 4x will be coring to cor(irgb_max-irgb_min) to calculate the oy_delt, the smaller the more protection to color, the larger only the rich color will be protected.

Control.name: reg_satprt_sat_rate
Control.desc: reg_satprt_sat_rate: rate to cor(irgb_max-irgb_min) to calculate the oy_delt,the larger the more protection to color; norm 16 as 1

Control.name: reg_satprt_csc_mode
Control.desc: reg_satprt_csc_mode: CSC mode of current yuv input: 0:601; 1:709; 2:BT2020 NCL; 3:reserved

Control.name: reg_satprt_is_lmt
Control.desc: reg_satprt_is_lmt: flag telling the YUV is limited range data or full rang data; 1 is limited data

Control.name: reg_satprt_enable
Control.desc: reg_satprt_enable: 1 to enable of saturation protection for dnlp adjustments

Control.name: reg_satprt_div_m_b

Control.desc: reg_satprt_lmt_rgb: u12x3, limit of RGB channel, for limited range RGB, set to 960, otherwise set to 1023.

Control.desc: reg_satprt_lmt_rgb: u12x3, limit of RGB channel, for limited range RGB, set to 960, otherwise set to 1023.

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_siderand
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_siderand : // unsigned , default = 1 options to use side two lines use the rand, instead of use for the YUV three component of middle line, 0: seed[3]/bandrand[3] for middle line yuv; 1: seed[3]/bandrand[3] for nearby three lines Y;

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_randmode
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_randmode : // unsigned , default = 0 mode of rand noise adding, 0: same noise strength for all difs; else: strenght of noise will not exceed the difs, MIN((pPKReg -> reg_nrdeband_bandrand[m]), noise[m])

Control.name: reg_freq_meter_en
Control.desc: reg_freq_meter_en: freq meter enable .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_h2_mode
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_h2_mode: selection filter H2, 0: [0 0 0 -2 0 0 2 0 0], 1: [-2 0 0 0 2], 2or3: [0-2 0 0 0 0 0 2 0] .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_v2_mode
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_v2_mode : selection filter V2, 0: [0 -2 0 0 2], 1: [-2 0 0 0 2] .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_d2_mode
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_d2_mode : selectino filter D2, 0: [0 -2 0 0 2], 1: [-2 0 0 0 2] .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_hwin_mm
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_hwin_mm : horizontal window size, 0:1x7, 1:1x9, 2or3: 1x11 .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_vwin_mm
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_vwin_mm : vertical window size, 0:1 cloumn,1:3cloumn, 2or3:5cloumn.unsigned,default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_xwin_st
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_xwin_st: window location: hstart .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_xwin_ed
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_xwin_ed: window location: hend .unsigned , default = 1920

Control.name: reg_fmeter_ywin_st
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_ywin_st: window location: vstart .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_ywin_ed
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_ywin_ed: window location: vend .unsigned , default = 1080

Control.name: reg_fmeter_coring_h
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_coring_h: coring of diff before compare with threshold for horizontal frequency .unsigned , default = 4

Control.name: reg_fmeter_coring_v
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_coring_v: coring of diff before compare with threshold for vertical frequency .unsigned , default = 4

Control.name: reg_fmeter_coring_d
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_coring_d: coring of diff before compare with threshold for diagonal frequency .unsigned , default = 4

Control.name: reg_fmeter_low_bound
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_low_bound: low bound for threshold .unsigned , default = 4

Control.name: reg_fmeter_ratio_h0
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_ratio_h0: ratio for threshold calc. for horizontal frequency, 16 is normalized as 1 .unsigned , default = 16

Control.name: reg_fmeter_ratio_h1
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_ratio_h1: ratio for threshold calc. for horizontal frequency, 16 is normalized as 1 .unsigned , default = 16

Control.desc: reg_sr3_sad_intlev_mode1: mode 1 of using diagonal protection: 1: with diagonal protection

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_maxerr_mode
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_maxerr_mode : : 0 max err; 1: xerr. unsigned , default = 1

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_core_rate
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_core_rate : : normalized 64 as 1. unsigned, default = 13

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_core_ofst
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_core_ofst : : normalized 64 as 1. signed, default = 1

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par0
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par0 : : threshold0 of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel, this will be set value of flat region mierr that no need peaking.. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par1
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par1 : : threshold1 of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel,this will be set value of texture region mierr that can not do peaking. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 24

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par2
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par2 : : level limit(for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel, this will be set to alp2 that we can do for flat region. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par3
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par3 : : level limit(for th0 less than mierr less than th1) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel, this will be set to alp2 that we can do for misc region. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 16

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par4
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par4 : : level limit(for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel, this will be set to alp2 that we can do for texture region. 0~255. default = 63;. unsigned , default = 255

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par5
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par5 : : rate0 (for mierr less than th0) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par6
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_minerr_par6 : : rate1 (for mierr>th1) of curve to map mierr to alp2 for luma channel. the larger of the value, the deep of the slope. 0~255.. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_min
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_min : : normalized to 64 as 1. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_alp2_max
Control.desc: reg_pk_alp2_max : : normalized to 64 as 1. unsigned , default = 63

Control.name: reg_final_gain_rs
Control.desc: reg_final_gain_rs : : right shift bits for the gain normalization, 0 normal to 32 as 1; 1 normal to 64 as 1; -2 normal to 8 as 1; -1 normal to 16 as 1 . signed , default = 0

Control.name: reg_hp_final_gain-variable
Control.desc: reg_hp_final_gain : : gain to highpass boost result (including directional/circle blending), normalized 32 as 1, 0~255. 1.25 * 32. unsigned , default = 40

Control.name: reg_bp_final_gain-variable
Control.desc: reg_bp_final_gain : : gain to bandpass boost result (including directional/circle blending), normalized 32 as 1, 0~255. 1.25 * 32. unsigned , default = 30

Control.name: reg_pk_sad_ver_gain
Control.desc: reg_pk_sad_ver_gain : : gain to sad[4], 16 normalized to 1;. unsigned , default = 24

Control.name: reg_pk_sad_hor_gain
Control.desc: reg_pk_sad_hor_gain : : gain to sad[0], 16 normalized to 1;. unsigned , default = 24

Control.name: reg_pk_bias_diag
Control.desc: reg_pk_bias_diag : : bias towards diag. unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_pk_drt_force
Control.desc: reg_pk_drt_force : : force direction of drt peaking filter, h2b: 0:hp drt force, 1: bp drt force; 2: bp+hp drt force, 3: no force;. unsigned , default = 24

Control.name: reg_pk_os_hsidecore
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_hsidecore : : side coring (not to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in horizontal direction. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 8

Control.name: reg_pk_os_hsidegain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_hsidegain : : side gain (not to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in horizontal direction. normalized to 32 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_os_hmidcore
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_hmidcore : : midd coring (to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in horizontal direction. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 2

Control.name: reg_pk_os_hmidgain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_hmidgain : : midd gain (to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in horizontal direction. normalized to 32 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_os_vsidecore
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_vsidecore : : side coring (not to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in vertical direction. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 8

Control.name: reg_pk_os_vsidegain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_vsidegain : : side gain (not to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in vertical direction. normalized to 32 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_os_vmidcore
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_vmidcore : : midd coring (to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in vertical direction. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 2

Control.name: reg_pk_os_vmidgain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_vmidgain : : midd gain (to current pixel) to adaptive overshoot margin in vertical direction. normalized to 32 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_os_minerr_core
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_minerr_core : : coring to minerr for adaptive overshoot margin. the larger of this value, the less overshoot admitted 0~255;. unsigned , default = 40

Control.name: reg_pk_os_minerr_gain
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_minerr_gain : : gain to minerr based adaptive overshoot margin. normalized to 64 as 1. 0~255;. unsigned , default = 6

Control.name: reg_pk_os_adpt_max
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_adpt_max : : maximum limit adaptive overshoot margin (4x). 0~255. unsigned , default = 200

Control.name: reg_pk_os_adpt_min-variable
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_adpt_min : : minimun limit adaptive overshoot margin (1x). 0~255. unsigned , default = 20

Control.name: reg_pk_osh_mode
Control.desc: reg_pk_osh_mode : : 0~3: (2x+1) window in H direction. unsigned , default = 2

Control.name: reg_pk_osv_mode
Control.desc: reg_pk_osv_mode : : 0~3: (2x+1) window in V direction. unsigned , default = 2

Control.name: reg_pk_os_down
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_down : : static negative overshoot margin. 0~1023. unsigned , default = 200

Control.name: reg_pk_os_up
Control.desc: reg_pk_os_up : : static positive overshoot margin. 0~1023. unsigned , default = 200

Control.name: reg_satprt_sat_core
Control.desc: reg_satprt_sat_core: 4x will be coring to cor(irgb_max-irgb_min) to calculate the oy_delt, the smaller the more protection to color, the larger only the rich color will be protected.

Control.name: reg_satprt_sat_rate
Control.desc: reg_satprt_sat_rate: rate to cor(irgb_max-irgb_min) to calculate the oy_delt,the larger the more protection to color; norm 16 as 1

Control.name: reg_satprt_csc_mode
Control.desc: reg_satprt_csc_mode: CSC mode of current yuv input: 0:601; 1:709; 2:BT2020 NCL; 3:reserved

Control.name: reg_satprt_is_lmt
Control.desc: reg_satprt_is_lmt: flag telling the YUV is limited range data or full rang data; 1 is limited data

Control.name: reg_satprt_enable
Control.desc: reg_satprt_enable: 1 to enable of saturation protection for dnlp adjustments

Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_rgb : // unsigned , default = 0 0 : yuv 1: RGB

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_en11
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_en11 : // unsigned , default = 1 debanding registers of side lines, [0] for luma, same for below

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_en10
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_en10 : // unsigned , default = 1 debanding registers of side lines, [1] for chroma, same for below

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_siderand
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_siderand : // unsigned , default = 1 options to use side two lines use the rand, instead of use for the YUV three component of middle line, 0: seed[3]/bandrand[3] for middle line yuv; 1: seed[3]/bandrand[3] for nearby three lines Y;

Control.name: reg_nrdeband_randmode
Control.desc: reg_nrdeband_randmode : // unsigned , default = 0 mode of rand noise adding, 0: same noise strength for all difs; else: strenght of noise will not exceed the difs, MIN((pPKReg -> reg_nrdeband_bandrand[m]), noise[m])

Control.name: reg_freq_meter_en
Control.desc: reg_freq_meter_en: freq meter enable .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_h2_mode
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_h2_mode: selection filter H2, 0: [0 0 0 -2 0 0 2 0 0], 1: [-2 0 0 0 2], 2or3: [0-2 0 0 0 0 0 2 0] .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_v2_mode
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_v2_mode : selection filter V2, 0: [0 -2 0 0 2], 1: [-2 0 0 0 2] .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_d2_mode
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_d2_mode : selectino filter D2, 0: [0 -2 0 0 2], 1: [-2 0 0 0 2] .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_hwin_mm
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_hwin_mm : horizontal window size, 0:1x7, 1:1x9, 2or3: 1x11 .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_vwin_mm
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_vwin_mm : vertical window size, 0:1 cloumn,1:3cloumn, 2or3:5cloumn.unsigned,default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_xwin_st
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_xwin_st: window location: hstart .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_xwin_ed
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_xwin_ed: window location: hend .unsigned , default = 1920

Control.name: reg_fmeter_ywin_st
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_ywin_st: window location: vstart .unsigned , default = 0

Control.name: reg_fmeter_ywin_ed
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_ywin_ed: window location: vend .unsigned , default = 1080

Control.name: reg_fmeter_coring_h
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_coring_h: coring of diff before compare with threshold for horizontal frequency .unsigned , default = 4

Control.name: reg_fmeter_coring_v
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_coring_v: coring of diff before compare with threshold for vertical frequency .unsigned , default = 4

Control.name: reg_fmeter_coring_d
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_coring_d: coring of diff before compare with threshold for diagonal frequency .unsigned , default = 4

Control.name: reg_fmeter_low_bound
Control.desc: reg_fmeter_low_bound: low bound for threshold .unsigned , default = 4

Control.desc: reg_fmeter_ratio_h0: ratio for threshold calc. for horizontal frequency, 16 is normalized as 1 .unsigned , default = 16
